original_text: The groups of enemies came with their animals. They put up their tents all across the land. They came like a cloud of locusts. They were too many to count as they arrived on their camels. They took everything that grew on the land.
korean_text: 이는 그들이 그들의 짐승과 장막을 가지고 올라와 메뚜기 떼 같이 많이 들어오니 그 사람과 낙타가 무수함이라 그들이 그 땅에 들어와 멸하려 하니

sentences.original_text: The groups of enemies came with their animals.
sentences.korean_translation: 적들의 무리들이 그들의 동물들과 함께 왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: They put up their tents all across the land.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 온 땅에 걸쳐 천막을 쳤습니다.

sentences.original_text: They came like a cloud of locusts.
They were too many to count
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 셀 수 없을 정도로 많았습니다.

sentences.original_text: as they arrived on their camels.
They took everything that grew on the land.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 땅에서 자라는 모든 것을 가져갔습니다.
